mapper.insert: INSERT INTO attendance (emp_no, att_time, work_day) SELECT #{emp_no}, NOW(), CURDATE() FROM DUAL WHERE NOT EXISTS ( SELECT 1 FROM attendance WHERE emp_no = #{emp_no} AND DATE(work_day) = CURDATE() )
mapper.update: UPDATE employee SET emp_password = #{password}, first_login = false WHERE emp_no = #{emp_no}
